original: @79a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @79a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: t'a ra de b'i n'a ma aashta sha ta kam/
analyzed: t'a ra de b'i n'a ma aashta sha ta kam/
translated: Taradevi-nama-ashta-shataka

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa //
translated: The One Hundred and Eight Names of Goddess Tara

original: lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi ga shal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi ga shal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great goddess Tara, who with a victory banner of various jewels, garments, and lower garments, makes a canopy for the great world systems.

original: de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma @79b mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa /🔽aom tre lo kya bi dza ya /
analyzed: de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma @79b mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa / aom tre lo kya bi dza ya /
translated: Then, at that time, the goddess Tara spoke the supreme dharani that had never been seen or heard before:🔽Om triloka-vijaya

original: aa tsi tta dza ya /
analyzed: aa tsi tta dza ya /
translated: Achi-tta jaya

original: aa ni ra tsi dza t'a ya /
analyzed: aa ni ra tsi dza t'a ya /
translated: Ani-rat-tsi-jata-ya

original: su dza ya /
analyzed: su dza ya /
translated: Sujaya

original: bi dza ya /
analyzed: bi dza ya /
translated: Vijaya

original: ma h'a dza ya /
analyzed: ma h'a dza ya /
translated: Maha-jaya

original: bi dza ya /
analyzed: bi dza ya /
translated: Vijaya

original: dza ya dza ya /🔽he he / sma ra sma ra /
analyzed: dza ya dza ya / he he / sma ra sma ra /

original: ba ra ba ra /
analyzed: ba ra ba ra /

original: ba ra da /
analyzed: ba ra da /

original: ma h'a de bi /🔽bi la sa /
analyzed: ma h'a de bi / bi la sa /

original: be la sa /
analyzed: be la sa /

original: bi la sa /
analyzed: bi la sa /

analyzed: ba dza aa mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi h'i h'i /

analyzed: ki ni ki ni bi lam ba se /
translated: Ki ni ki ni vilambase.

original: sma ra sma ra /
analyzed: sma ra sma ra /
translated: Smara smara.

original: ma h'a pra dzny'a aa ni ba ta /
analyzed: ma h'a pra dzny'a aa ni ba ta /

original: badzra ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a; bha gi ni hr'um hr'um/🔽spu ta sphu ta /
analyzed: badzra ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a; bha gi ni hr'um hr'um/ spu ta sphu ta /

original: spho ta spho ta /
analyzed: spho ta spho ta /

original: aa be sha ya /
analyzed: aa be sha ya /

original: aa be sha ya /🔽dhu na dhu na /🔽bi dhu na /
analyzed: aa be sha ya / dhu na dhu na / bi dhu na /
translated: Avasaya.

original: bi dhu na /🔽kampa / kampa /
analyzed: bi dhu na / kampa / kampa /
translated: Dhunadhunadhunadhunadhunadhu.🔽Vidhunavidhunavidhunavidhu.🔽Kampakampakampaya.

original: kampa ya / su ra bi gandha /
analyzed: kampa ya / su ra bi gandha /

original: a ti si ta /
analyzed: a ti si ta /
translated: Atisiti.

original: mu khe ha la da ba la /
analyzed: mu khe ha la da ba la /
translated: Mukhahaladavalaya.

original: sam ga r'a dz'a na bi ma bi gi /
analyzed: sam ga r'a dz'a na bi ma bi gi /

original: bi na sha ya bi n'a sha ya /
analyzed: bi na sha ya bi n'a sha ya /

original: he bha ga ba ti /
analyzed: he bha ga ba ti /
translated: He bhagavati.

original: santra sa ya /
analyzed: santra sa ya /
translated: Santrasaya.

original: bi ga n'a na /
analyzed: bi ga n'a na /
translated: Viganan.

original: pa ri ba l'a ya /
analyzed: pa ri ba l'a ya /
translated: Parivalaya.

original: aasma kam aasma kam/
analyzed: aasma kam aasma kam/
translated: Asmakamasmakam.

original: m'a da ni m'a da ni /
analyzed: m'a da ni m'a da ni /
translated: Madanam madana.

original: sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
analyzed: sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
translated: Sambohaya sambohaya.

original: ha ra ha ra /
analyzed: ha ra ha ra /
translated: Hara hara.

original: hi ri hi ri /
analyzed: hi ri hi ri /
translated: Hiri hiri.

original: hu ru hu ru /
analyzed: hu ru hu ru /
translated: Huru huru.

original: bi ta ra ka ba ra dza /
analyzed: bi ta ra ka ba ra dza /
translated: Vitraka varaja.

original: ham ham/ tro t'a ya ham ham/
analyzed: ham ham/ tro t'a ya ham ham/
translated: Ham ham trotaya ham ham.

original: santri t'a ya /🔽santro ya / manta manta /
analyzed: santri t'a ya / santro ya / manta manta /
translated: Santritaya.🔽Santroya.🔽Manda manda.

original: marda marda / tsa ra tsa ra /
analyzed: marda marda / tsa ra tsa ra /
translated: Cara cara.

original: sam tsa ra sam tsa ra /
analyzed: sam tsa ra sam tsa ra /
translated: Samcara samcara.

original: be ga be ga be ga ba ti /
analyzed: be ga be ga be ga ba ti /
translated: Vaga vaga vagavati.

original: na mo na mo na ma: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na mo na mo na ma: sv'a h'a /
translated: Namo namaḥ namaḥ svāhā.

original: de nas lha dang lha min tshogs //🔽srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am /
analyzed: de nas lha dang lha min tshogs // srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am /
translated: Then the hosts of gods and demigods,🔽Rākṣasas, yakṣas, and kumbhāṇḍas,

original: ci // lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams //
analyzed: ci // lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams //
translated: Great nāgas, bhūtas, gandharvas, and mātṛs,

original: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog /
translated: The supreme ones renowned in the three worlds,

original: gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas //
translated: Having heard this great mantra,

original: skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te //
analyzed: skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te //
translated: Were frightened and hung their heads low.

original: lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas //
analyzed: lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas //
translated: Shaking their great arms,

original: gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di //
analyzed: gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di //
translated: They said this for the sake of the three worlds:

original: @80a *// mtha' dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: @80a *// mtha' dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to pervade this entire earth,

original: 'dod pa'i lha yi ngag bzlog pa //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha yi ngag bzlog pa //
translated: The speech of the desire realm gods

original: sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Is refuted by the one with vast eyes, the noble Tārā.

original: spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs smras pa //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs smras pa //
translated: The one who speaks of the family of Avalokiteśvara

original: che ba nyid kyis grags pa'o //🔽spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams //
analyzed: che ba nyid kyis grags pa'o // spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams //
translated: Is renowned for his greatness.🔽You with vast eyes, you have appeared

original: phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags //
analyzed: phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags //
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings.

original: de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa //
analyzed: de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa //
translated: Then Īśvara and the others,

original: lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang // de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams //
analyzed: lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang // de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams //
translated: the lords of knowledge mantras, and likewise the knowledge mantra practitioners,

original: bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te //
analyzed: bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te //
translated: having draped their upper robes over one shoulder,

original: bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang /
analyzed: bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang /
translated: having made the supreme circumambulation,

original: pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du //
analyzed: pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du //
translated: having placed their knees on the ground,

original: btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras //
analyzed: btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras //
translated: spoke these words:

original: sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni //
analyzed: sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni //
translated: To that Tara, blazing with light,

original: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: we pay homage, we pay homage, we pay homage!

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis //
translated: With the excellent one hundred and eight names,

original: dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi //
analyzed: dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi //
translated: we will utter the incomparable names.

original: bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba //
analyzed: bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba //
translated: Auspicious, victorious, excellent glory,

original: skye rgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes myur //
analyzed: skye rgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes myur //
translated: powerful over living beings, with swift higher perceptions,

original: dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag /
analyzed: dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag /
translated: powerful, delighted, fierce in fear,

original: rgod bag med cing dregs pa med //
analyzed: rgod bag med cing dregs pa med //
translated: not agitated, not arrogant,

original: padma'i spyan dang padma'i zhal //
analyzed: padma'i spyan dang padma'i zhal //
translated: lotus-eyed, lotus-faced,

original: padma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin //
translated: bestowing the pure lotus center,

original: spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste //
analyzed: spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste //
translated: with beautiful eyes, expansive eyes,

original: sngo ba autpal sngon po'i 'od //
analyzed: sngo ba autpal sngon po'i 'od //
translated: blue like the light of a blue lotus.

original: skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin; ;de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa //🔽mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste //
analyzed: skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin; ;de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa // mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste //
translated: and likewise the giver of strength and the giver of form.🔽The lord, the protector, the fierce one,

original: dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma //
translated: the one who conquers the three jewels.

original: sgros dmar so ni dmar ba ste //
analyzed: sgros dmar so ni dmar ba ste //
translated: The one with red lips and red teeth,

original: spyan rtsa dmar @80b pos gzigs par mdzad //
analyzed: spyan rtsa dmar @80b pos gzigs par mdzad //
translated: looking with red eyes.

original: dga' mdzad dga' stobs padma lags //
analyzed: dga' mdzad dga' stobs padma lags //
translated: The one who delights, the powerful one, the lotus,

original: padma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes //
analyzed: padma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes //
translated: the one with the color of a lotus, the one who delights in the color of a lotus.

original: 'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste //
translated: The one who tames the three worlds, the peaceful one,

original: 'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che //
translated: the one with a frightening appearance, the powerful one.

original: 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma //
analyzed: 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma //
translated: The one who enters into discipline, the one who disciplines,

original: bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags //
analyzed: bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags //
translated: the one with praise, the supreme human, the holy one.

original: rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can //
analyzed: rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can //
translated: The one who is very clear, the one with discipline, the one with the vajra,

original: rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba //
translated: the victorious one, the radiant one,

original: byang chub rdul med dri ma med //
analyzed: byang chub rdul med dri ma med //
translated: the enlightenment, the stainless, the immaculate,

original: zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje //
analyzed: zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje //
translated: the moon, the supreme god, the lord.

original: sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar //
analyzed: sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar //
translated: From the one who is to be worshipped to the one who worships,

original: rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes //
analyzed: rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes //
translated: wandering and going, the one with beautiful light rays.

original: chu lha g-yul 'gyed 'gying bag can //
analyzed: chu lha g-yul 'gyed 'gying bag can //
translated: The water god, the one who struts in battle,

original: skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas //
analyzed: skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas //
translated: the supreme being, the one with a naturally expansive mind.

original: gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum //
analyzed: gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum //
translated: The three topknots are the three layers of fat.

original: spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel pa //
analyzed: spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel pa //
translated: The three eyes are the three impurities.

original: srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba //
analyzed: srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba //
translated: The one who removes existence is virtuous within.

original: tshig ldan ma yang de bzhin grags //
analyzed: tshig ldan ma yang de bzhin grags //
translated: The one with words is also known as such.

original: rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin //
analyzed: rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin //
translated: The Victor is the giver of gifts, the giver of merit.

original: sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med //
translated: The one who conquers evil is fearless.

original: nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma //
analyzed: nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma //
translated: The giver of wealth, the giver of color, is the peaceful one.

original: gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang //
analyzed: gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang //
translated: The one with a good body, good eyes, and good breasts

original: sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul //🔽dul ba srung ba rdul sel ba //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul // dul ba srung ba rdul sel ba //
translated: is the one with magic, the one with magic, the one who tames.🔽The one who tames is the protector, the one who removes dust.

original: phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma //
analyzed: phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma //
translated: The one who holds a garland is the one who creates intoxication.

original: rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma //
analyzed: rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma //
translated: The giver of intoxication is the one who abandons pride.

original: drag mo lags te gzi skyed ma //
analyzed: drag mo lags te gzi skyed ma //
translated: The fierce one is the one who creates splendor.

original: dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo //
analyzed: dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo //
translated: The white one is the one who pacifies, the one who brings bliss.

original: skye rgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan //
analyzed: skye rgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan //
translated: The lady of beings is endowed with Brahma.

original: tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags //
analyzed: tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags //
translated: The giver of Brahma is the best of lords.

original: zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal //
translated: The one with the light of the moon, the one with a moon face,

original: zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad //
translated: the one who steals the splendor of the moon.

original: nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog @81a *//
analyzed: nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog @81a *//
translated: The one who steals the splendor of the sun

original: dgyes pa mo //
analyzed: dgyes pa mo //
translated: is the one who delights.

original: yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ba mo //
analyzed: yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ba mo //
translated: Beautiful, good, peaceful,

original: bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs //
analyzed: bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs //
translated: Happy, blissful, with a crown and a platform,

original: bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma //
analyzed: bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma //
translated: Auspicious, removing obstacles,

original: nor sbel bsod nams rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: nor sbel bsod nams rnam par rgyal //
translated: Rich, with merit fully victorious,

original: dzambu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od //
translated: With the radiance of Jambu River gold and silver,

original: 'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin //
analyzed: 'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin //
translated: Removing fear, giving fearlessness,

original: sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal //
analyzed: sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal //
translated: Tara, with a face like the moon,

original: sems can kun la med mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sems can kun la med mi 'gyur //
translated: Never absent for any being,

original: mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma //
analyzed: mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma //
translated: An object of worship, an object of homage, bringing joy,

original: cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang //
analyzed: cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang //
translated: With a blue complexion, having an excellent complexion,

original: rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste //
analyzed: rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste //
translated: Adorned with red ornaments,

original: na bza' gser mnabs gang+g'a ma //
analyzed: na bza' gser mnabs gang+g'a ma //
translated: Wearing a golden robe, with the Ganges,

original: dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs //
analyzed: dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs //
translated: White, blazing, all-seeing,

original: gi 'u wa nga gi  thig le spos //
analyzed: gi 'u wa nga gi  thig le spos //
translated: With a bindu of musk,

original: 'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid //
analyzed: 'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid //
translated: Having a wheel, a vajra, and a water deity,

original: dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma //
translated: Having a supreme maṇḍala, terrifying,

original: tshems dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum //🔽dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor thogs //
analyzed: tshems dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum // dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor thogs //
translated: With white teeth, smiling with white teeth,🔽Wearing armlets, earrings, and anklets,

original: do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can //
analyzed: do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can //
translated: With a garland blazing with tassels,

original: 'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma //
analyzed: 'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma //
translated: Bhadra, Bhadra-prabha, Bhadra-mukha,

original: grog ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs //🔽nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang //
analyzed: grog ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs // nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang //
translated: Nimba-patra,🔽Cūḍā-maṇi, Maṇi-dhara,

original: nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs //
analyzed: nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs //
translated: Maṇi-bhūṣaṇa,

original: nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can //
analyzed: nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can //
translated: Maṇi-raśmi-prabha,

original: nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba //
analyzed: nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba //
translated: Maṇi-maṇḍala-vyūha,

original: 'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can //
translated: Jvāla-varṇa, Vajra,

original: skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad //🔽zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad // zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can //
translated: Awakening men and women,🔽Śiva, Dhanva, Dāntī,

original: tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan //
translated: Brahma-mukha, Vāyu-mukha,

original: bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs //
analyzed: bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs //
translated: Female, Ākāśa-gāminī,🔽Goddess, Para-prabhā,

original: lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro @81b ma; ;'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul //
analyzed: lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro @81b ma; ;'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul //
translated: Prabhā, Kāma-dā,

original: 'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma //
translated: Kāma-krodha, Pramathana,

original: drag po thor tshugs gtsug phud can //
analyzed: drag po thor tshugs gtsug phud can //
translated: Śiva, Jaṭī, Jaṭā-dhara,

original: tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal //
analyzed: tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal //
translated: Brahma, Brahma-vādin, Jina,

original: pingka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma //
analyzed: pingka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma //
translated: Kokila-svara, Su-vaktra,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes //
translated: Lokeśvara, Kula-varṇa,

original: dbyig pa'i shing la rdo rje thogs //
analyzed: dbyig pa'i shing la rdo rje thogs //
translated: Vajra, Vajra-pāṇi,

original: drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan //
analyzed: drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan //
translated: The powerful one is adorned with precious light.

original: gshegs na snyan cha dri med g-yo //
analyzed: gshegs na snyan cha dri med g-yo //
translated: When she goes, her earrings sway.

original: gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug /
analyzed: gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug /
translated: She enters the mind of Yama.

original: rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma //
translated: The knowledge-mantra bearer has a form.

original: stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad //
analyzed: stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad //
translated: She makes the five powers powerful.

original: stobs dang stobs mang mnga' ba ste //
analyzed: stobs dang stobs mang mnga' ba ste //
translated: She has power and many powers.

original: shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad //
translated: She cuts with the weapon of wisdom.

original: sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan //
analyzed: sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan //
translated: She is an artist and has artistic skill.

original: de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags //
analyzed: de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags //
translated: She is speech and speaks.

original: steng nas khyams dang khyams bzang tshul //
analyzed: steng nas khyams dang khyams bzang tshul //
translated: Above, she is like a courtyard and an excellent courtyard.

original: tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal //
analyzed: tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal //
translated: She is clear with a garland of jasmine flowers.

original: ser mo can pa legs pa'i rten //
analyzed: ser mo can pa legs pa'i rten //
translated: She is golden and has an excellent support.

original: drag mo phyag na chun po thogs //
analyzed: drag mo phyag na chun po thogs //
translated: The powerful one holds a garland in her hand.

original: skal pa bzang mo gshal ka can //
analyzed: skal pa bzang mo gshal ka can //
translated: She is fortunate and has a braid.

original: de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes //
analyzed: de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes //
translated: She is very pleased.

original: rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan //
translated: She has a very powerful family mark.

original: rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma //
translated: She is Vajra Wrathful One, the one who delights.

original: bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs //
analyzed: bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs //
translated: She is blissful, intelligent, and has a vajra.

original: blo mdzad shes rab skyed par mdzad //
analyzed: blo mdzad shes rab skyed par mdzad //
translated: She is the one who acts with intelligence and generates wisdom.

original: lha mo la me cod pan can //
analyzed: lha mo la me cod pan can //
translated: The goddess has a crown of flames.

original: lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma //
analyzed: lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma //
translated: The rest of the ways are for all the gods.

original: sred med bu mo sdig pa sel //
analyzed: sred med bu mo sdig pa sel //
translated: The daughter of Viṣṇu removes sin.

original: bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes //
analyzed: bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes //
translated: Auspicious, modest, and joyful,

original: rab tu dga' ba grogs na dga'//🔽spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba grogs na dga'// spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan //
translated: she is the friend of supreme joy.🔽She is endowed with the joy of the way of conduct,

original: dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste //🔽chos rnams @82a *//
analyzed: dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste // chos rnams @82a *//
translated: and delights the beloved.

original: kun gyi legs pa'i rten //
analyzed: kun gyi legs pa'i rten //
translated: She is the support of all good dharmas.

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma //
translated: She emanates the emanations of the buddhas.

original: nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste //
translated: She removes pride,

original: las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing //
translated: and conquers karma and afflictions.

original: 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma //
translated: She conquers the army of desire.

original: shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa //
translated: She is the buddha who possesses the ten knowledges,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
translated: abiding in the ten perfections.

original: sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa //
analyzed: sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa //
translated: She has attained mastery over the ten stages,

original: stobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma //
analyzed: stobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma //
translated: and is illuminated by the ten powers.

original: rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: She is the vajra crown, the vajra holder,

original: rdo rje phra mo lha min sel //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo lha min sel //
translated: the vajra particle, the remover of asuras,

original: dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags //🔽rdo rje lcags kyu bde ba dpal //
analyzed: dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags // rdo rje lcags kyu bde ba dpal //
translated: the vajra of time, the great bestower,🔽the vajra hook, the glory of bliss,

original: rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang //
analyzed: rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang //
translated: the vajra noose, the excellent noose,

original: sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams //
translated: You hold a vajra in your hand,

original: yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad //
analyzed: yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad //
translated: Delightful, satisfying to the mind,

original: pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad pa //
analyzed: pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad pa //
translated: Removing obstacles from afar.

original: tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste //
analyzed: tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste //
translated: You are the one who satisfies, bestowing great bliss,🔽Displaying dance-like movements,

original: rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad; ;chos can ha la ha la'i 'od //
analyzed: rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad; ;chos can ha la ha la'i 'od //
translated: You are the one with the Dharma, the light of hālāhala,

original: chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags //
analyzed: chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags //
translated: The one who bestows the gift of Dharma, the seer.🔽You are the one who emanates vajras,

original: khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste //
translated: And is called the vajra of nectar,

original: rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che //
translated: The vajra blazing with great strength.

original: lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal //🔽bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis //
analyzed: lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal // bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis //
translated: I pay homage to you, great goddess.🔽By our praises here,

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod //
translated: We will recite these supreme one hundred and eight names.

original: kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni //
analyzed: kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni //
translated: Oh! Oh! Blessed One, the supreme one,

original: smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsungs //🔽de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //🔽'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi //
analyzed: smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsungs // de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi //
translated: Please tell us, the supreme ones among speakers,🔽Then, the radiant and brilliant

original: lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can //
translated: Goddess Tārā, resembling the light of the moon,🔽Majestic and smiling,

original: 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa //
analyzed: 'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa //
translated: Uttered these words:

original: dbang phyug @82b chen po la sogs kun //
analyzed: dbang phyug @82b chen po la sogs kun //
translated: All of you, Maheśvara and so forth,

original: nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis //
analyzed: nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis //
translated: Listen to my words!

original: thams cad rtag tu mthun par ni //
analyzed: thams cad rtag tu mthun par ni //
translated: Always be in harmony with all,

original: stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis //
analyzed: stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis //
translated: And strive for the ten powers.🔽Also, always protect

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang //🔽dus kun du ni srung bar gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang // dus kun du ni srung bar gyis //
translated: The great way of the Tathāgatas.

original: zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni //
analyzed: zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni //
translated: By focusing on the path of peace,🔽You who delight in crossing over

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing //
translated: The unbearable ocean of saṃsāra,

original: 'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa //🔽rgal dga' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis /
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa // rgal dga' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis /
translated: The basis of great fear, should cross over.

original: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la //
translated: Aiming for the city of nirvāṇa,

original: dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis //🔽de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi //
analyzed: dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis // de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi //
translated: Strive and enter.🔽Then, with a face beautiful

original: phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra //
analyzed: phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal // de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra //
translated: Like a garland of blazing sunlight,🔽The Tathāgata spoke these words

original: 'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa //
translated: Resounding like thunder:

original: kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog /
analyzed: kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog /
translated: Oh, the supreme vidyā of Tārā,🔽Which dispels darkness,

original: mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa //
analyzed: mun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa //
translated: Generates vast power,

original: sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa //
translated: And severs all obscurations,

original: tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis //
analyzed: tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis //
translated: With the splendor that produces the accumulations,

original: dag par byas pa ma yin pas //🔽shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi //
analyzed: dag par byas pa ma yin pas // shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi //
translated: And have not purified themselves,🔽Will not hear this dhāraṇī

original: gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Which brings great joy.

original: sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i //
analyzed: sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i //
translated: For those who have previously made effort for buddhahood,

original: brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la //🔽dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi //
analyzed: brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la // dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi //
translated: The steadfast ones with splendor,🔽This pledge of the great pledge knowledge mantra

original: dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing //
analyzed: dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur // nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing //
translated: Will come forth.🔽The dhāraṇī mantra that destroys all afflictions

original: sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa //
translated: And removes all misdeeds,

original: sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i //
translated: That distinguishes all sentient beings,

original: gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa //🔽su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis //🔽nyan tam 'chang @83a *//
analyzed: gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa // su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis // nyan tam 'chang @83a *//
translated: Is the supreme vajra holder.🔽Whoever listens to it,🔽Upholds it, or reads it

original: ngam klog byed na //🔽rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: ngam klog byed na // rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin //
translated: While in equipoise,🔽Will accomplish all its purposes

original: de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Just as it was taught by the self-arisen one.

original: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
translated: Liberated from all afflictions,

original: sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog /
analyzed: sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog /
translated: Supreme over all sentient beings,🔽They will be equal to the Tathāgatas

original: 'jig rten dag tu chos shes la //🔽'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag tu chos shes la //🔽'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs //
translated: Who introduce the Dharma to the world.

original: su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
analyzed: su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di //
translated: Whoever recites these one hundred and eight names

original: 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal //
analyzed: 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal //
translated: of Tārā, the moon-faced one,

original: de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni //
analyzed: de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni //
translated: and praises her in this way,

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur //
translated: will attain buddhahood itself.

original: de yi don kyang 'grub 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de yi don kyang 'grub 'gyur zhing //
translated: Their aims will be accomplished,🔽and they will be under the power

original: rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi //
analyzed: rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi //
translated: of all the kings, powerful men,

original: gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang //🔽thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur //🔽lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i //
analyzed: gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang // thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur // lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i //
translated: and other beings that are counted.

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di //
translated: This fame of the one hundred and eight names🔽of the goddess Tārā, the one with the beautiful face,🔽removes all the pride,

original: 'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o //
translated: afflictions, and unrighteousness in the world.

original: de nas bdud ris gyen du g-yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa //
analyzed: de nas bdud ris gyen du g-yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa //
translated: Then, the one who causes the mountain of the class of demons to tremble,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba //
translated: who has a body like the supreme mountain of the Tathāgata,

original: 'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po //
analyzed: 'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po //
translated: who awakens the gods and humans with clear light,

original: rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis bsten pa yis //
analyzed: rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis bsten pa yis //
translated: is attended by the foremost of the Victor's sons with special strength.

original: gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la; ;don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang //
analyzed: gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la; ;don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang //
translated: which is renowned for its great meaning and engages for the sake of benefit.🔽The Dharma of the highest virtue, the one who gathers,

original: rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas //
analyzed: rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas //
translated: and likewise the one who eliminates the fever of discriminating thoughts,🔽the one who eliminates the afflictions without forbearance,

original: bzod med nyon mongs @83b sel ba dang // zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig /
analyzed: bzod med nyon mongs @83b sel ba dang // zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig /
translated: and the words that generate a peaceful mind.

original: rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas //
analyzed: rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas //
translated: The supreme Victor spoke thus,

original: gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs //
analyzed: gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs //
translated: and then remained silent.

original: de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtser gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la //
analyzed: de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtser gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la //
translated: Then the supreme goddess Tārā, delighted and captivating the mind,

original: dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas //
analyzed: dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas //
translated: having heard the words that generate vast joy and bestow longevity and bliss,🔽the entire assembly of gods and demigods became filled with joy and amazement,

original: lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas; ;rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas; ;rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar 'gyur //
translated: and with great delight, they bowed their heads and joined their palms in supplication.

original: sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te /
analyzed: sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te /
translated: This is the dhāraṇī called The Supreme Tārā.

original: lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The one hundred and eight names of the goddess Tara are complete.
